thread.title: Adorable Video Of Afua Aduonum's Daughter Sashaying Goes Viral: "Like Mother Like Daughter" - YEN.COM.GH
thread.title_full: Adorable Video Of Afua Aduonum's Daughter Sashaying Goes Viral: "Like Mother Like Daughter" - YEN.COM.GH

author: Philip Boateng Kessie
title: Adorable Video Of Afua Aduonum's Daughter Sashaying Goes Viral: "Like Mother Like Daughter" - YEN.COM.GH
text: Adorable Video Of Afua Aduonum's Daughter Sashaying Goes Viral: "Like Mother Like Daughter" - A video of Afua Asantewaa Aduonum's daughter has sparked reactions on social media - The girl who has striking resemblance with her mother was seen displaying some catwalk moves - Netizens who thronged the comments section of the video commended the girl and her mother as well Many people have been left in awe after a video of Afua Asantewaa Aduonum's daughter sashaying went viral online. The video which was sighted by YEN.com.gh on the TikTok page of @etruwaaa showed the moment the girl was spotted at a place which looked like a restaurant. Having a striking resemblance with her mother, [the girl who was dressed like a](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/music/248373-afua-asantewaa-daughter-sing-dance-video-warms-hearts-online/) queen displayed for the camera as she took [her time to sashay as if she](https://yen.com.gh/people/248422-husband-afua-aduonum-children-understanding-deied-love-christmas/) was on a walkway introducing a new dress to an expectant audience. Video of Afua Asantewaa making a U-turn on giving up on the GWR attempt for the longest sing-a-thon goes viral The way she walked with swag and confidence made it apparent that she had been practising her moves for some time now. [PAY ATTENTION: Let the battle of the stars BEGIN! Voting for the YEN Entertainment Awards 2023 is LIVE!](https://corp.yen.com.gh/yen-awards#) The 21-second video which was captioned, "Modelling is in my DNA," had raked in over 9,0000 likes and 49 comments [at the time of writing the report.](https://www.tiktok.com/@etruwaaa/video/7284303063781772549) Ghanaians react to the video Social media users who reacted to the video showered praises on the girl with many also commending her mother. @Faculty_street tv wrote: She will be contesting for the Ghana most beautiful one day [I'm foxglove](https://www.tiktok.com/@dufie012) reacted: my girl, go ahead, mommy is out there fighting for you muslimahowusuchar like mother like daughter awesome Queen mach Love from me Inshallah mummy's going to break the record for sure Celyn Ahuofe indicated: eii etruwaaa you're really glittering Avisilla indicated: like mada like dawta Husband of Afua Aduounum congratulates her Earlier, [YEN.com.gh reported that](https://yen.com.gh/people/248421-afua-aduonum-husband-admits-doubted-quest-break-record/) the husband of Afua Asantewaa Aduonum has congratulated his wife. Speaking in an interview with TV3, Mr [Kofi](https://yen.com.gh/109539-kofi-kinaata-songs-top-trending-2020-videos.html) Owusu Aduonum said he never doubted his wife's ability to embark on the singing marathon. He expressed joy that his wife had achieved her intended target and was hopeful that her desire for embarking on the singathon would come to fruition.
